message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value. To start, I'd like to propose a price of $150 for it. I trust this aligns well with its quality and benefits. Let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I recognize the value of the product, $150 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. After considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $140. This allows us both to reach a fair agreement while ensuring I receive a reasonable return for my product. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
